title: chatterbox Voices
description: ChatterBox Voices are the audio localisation experts, bespoke voice agency and state-of-the-art production hub with the talent, creativity and experience to bring your project to life.

title: Ramacca News
description: Notizie di cronaca, eventi, cultura e approfondimento di quanto accade nel territorio ramacchese e di tutto ciò che lo riguarda

title: Mini Kanban
description: Web app with drag and drop features that allows to schedule tasks for personal projects. Written in vanilla js

title: The Final CountDown
description: Web app to save a custom countdown and check whener you want. You can also choose to switch to light or dark mode, settings are saved.

title: Infinite Reddit Pics
description: Infinite scrolling app that takes pictures from top reddit pics subreddit using the Reddit Listing API

title: Covid-19 Italia
description: Open source online tool to monitoring the number of people infected with COVID-19 in Italy day by day. Data from pcm-dpc/COVID-19, charts by ChartJS

title: Chat Web App
description: Realtime web chat made with Node.js and Socket.io

title: Task Manager JS
description: A task manager app made with Node.js workflow

title: Termometro Online
description: App developed in PHP and JQuery, using the WeatherSkack API

title: sarioRC
description: SarioRC (render components) is a microframework written in PHP that make super easy to write a PHP web app with a components base approach.

title: Mozilla Italia
description: Mozilla is the non-profit organization that made Firefox, the first alternative browser. It has always promoted products and policies to keep the Internet at the service of people

title: Metal: Hellsinger
description: Metal Hellsinger combines an FPS, a rhythm game, and some face-melting metal riffs into a truly unique gaming experience as you battle your way through hell to a beat

title: Remothered: Broken Porcelain
platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
description: Survival horror video game created, written and directed by the Italian video game artist and director Chris Darril, developed by Italian studio Stormind Games and published by Darril Arts in collaboration with Modus Games by Maximum Games

title: Remothered: Tormented Fathers
platforms: PC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
description: The pure and realistic survival horror video game by Darril Arts, directed by Chris Darril, and developed by Stormind Games. The story unwinds around Rosemary Reed, who arrives at Felton’s house to investigate on the disappearance of a little girl

title: Marvel Hero Tales
description: Join Spider-Man and Ms. Marvel along with all your favorite Marvel Super Heroes and discover a brand new way of experiencing Marvel adventures! Run, jump and swing your way across New York City with new adventures being added all the time!

title: Epic World Adventure
description: Help kids aged 6-11 improve their vocabulary and ace their exams. Play the world’s most educational scooter game.

title: Robozuna
description: Enter the arena and take your Combatabot to the top by defeating rival bots in battles and earning new parts to add to your bot. Build up your bot, fight your way to the top and collect information on all of the Combatabots to complete your codex.

title: Dojym Fighters
description: Are you a Martial Arts enthusiast? This is the game for you! Dojym Fighter is the first martial arts game,that includes the 10 martial arts best known in the world,and techniques typical of each discipline.

title: Ellybee at School
description: English has never been so fun... let Elly take you on her magical adventure. Choose the book and point the camera at the special symbols you find inside the book.

title: Trip eMotion
description: Trip eMotion is the serious game in which you can explore cultural heritage in a fun, fast and accessible way to everyone. Thanks to the use of the most innovative technologies, the sites of interest and museum spaces within the game are reconstructed in 3D with the utmost fidelity, thus creating an experience that has little to do with the traditional virtual tour

title: Latage
description: Made using HTML, Bootstrap 4, Javascript, jQuery, Google chart API and Query string encoder. You can also calc the equation with Wolfram Alpha. Latage is open source, you can download the source code and add new features.

title: Ammissione Medicina
description: Thanks to this app you will always be updated with the news, calls, dates, test methods, minimum scores and much more regarding the national admission test for medicine and surgery university course.

title: GPS Localizer Offiline
description: This app will allow you to acquire, at any time and without the need to connect, the GPS coordinates (latitude and longitude in decimal degrees DD) of the point where you are and to share them with your friends via SMS or email.

title: Amissione Veterinaria
description: Thanks to this app you will always be updated with the news, calls, dates, test methods, minimum scores and much more regarding the national admission test for veterinary university course.

title: MyTrack
description: MyTrack is an android app for the analysis of the brightness, noise and vibration variance of the device on a given route or path. Thanks to the simple and convenient interface you can start a recording by setting the read data to the passage of a certain amount of seconds; these data are then displayed through the graphics, with possibility of see the track on a map.

title: Euclia
description: Welcome to Euclia, a world where life goes normally until a thief steals from the laboratories of Triangle LAB a time machine and begins to sow chaos in all ages. It's task for Agent Square to catch him and restore order, and to do this he must travel in all time eras visited by the thief and defeat the enemies that will arise in front.

title: Slenderman Returns
description: Slenderman Returns is a video game heavily inspired by the original independent video game 'Slender: The Eight Pages', but redesigned to run on the famous Unity game engine.

title: Fiabe dei Fratelli Grimm
description: This app contains the entire collection of exciting fairy tales written by the Brothers Grimm. These fairy tales are considered today as the most profound and significant in the history of world literature, with the dubious purpose of delighting and educating the reader; for this there is no recommended age for reading, but anyone, child or adult who is can draw fun and a deep meaning from these fairy tales.

title: Fiabe di La Fontaine
description: La Fontaine presents himself as the continuer of Aesop and Phaedrus and the disciple of Epicurus; he often has moral intentions and satire and contrast are among his favorite methods. Among the most famous fairy tales 'The rooster and the fox', 'The crow and the fox', 'The cat and the tiger'
